mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (USERID, PASSWORD, NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, GENDER, STATUS, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, CNT) VALUES(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{addr}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{status}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT U.*, DECODE( BIRTH, NULL, '정보없음', SUBSTR(BIRTH, 3, 2) || '.' || SUBSTR(BIRTH, 5, 2) || '.' || SUBSTR(BIRTH, 7, 2) ) CBIRTH FROM TBL_USER U
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_USER SET CNT = CNT + 1 WHERE USERID = #{id}
UPDATE TBL_USER SET CNT = 0 WHERE USERID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_USER WHERE USERID = #{userId} AND NAME = #{userName} AND REPLACE(PHONE, '-', '') = REPLACE(#{userNum}, '-', '')
